issue.title: Java: API documentation
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-98](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-98). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
For developers using Arrow via Java, we should provide an automatically generated API documentation with a typical tool used in the Java world.
